OnActionAddPartCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddPartController
This is the cancel button that takes the user back to the main screen without saving the input
OnActionAddPartSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddPartController
This allows the user to save parts

Method for InHouse radio button.

Method for Outsourced radio button.
OnActionAddProdAdd(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductController
This adds the selected part to the bottom table.
OnActionAddProdCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductController
When a user clicks cancel, the user will be redirected back to main screen and input will not be saved
OnActionAddProdRemove(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductController
This removes parts from the bottom table.
OnActionAddProdSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductController
This allows users to input new data, and save it.
OnActionAddProductSearch(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductController
This is the search function that allows users to search for parts name or ID If there are no matching product found, an alert box will appear
OnActionMainExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Exit button that closes the application, with an alert confirming exit
OnActionMainPartAdd(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
This directs users to the add part screen when button is clicked
OnActionMainPartDelete(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Deletes a part from the table.
OnActionMainPartModify(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
When a user selects a part, and clicks modify, the user will be redirected to the modify part screen with the existing data
OnActionMainProductAdd(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
This refreshes the table when the search field is cleared
OnActionMainProductDelete(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
When a user selects a product, and clicks delete a confirmation will appear
OnActionMainProductModify(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
When a product is selected, and a user clicks modify, it opens modify product form with the existing input transferred over to the new screen
OnActionModifyProdSearchButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductController
This is the search function that allows users to search for parts using name or ID
OnActionModPartCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyPartController
This is for the cancel button, that will redirect user back to main screen without saving the input
OnActionModPartSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyPartController
LOGICAL ERROR: When a part is selected, then modified and saved, when trying to modify again, the radio button switches from InHouse to Outsourced even when originally InHouse was saved.
OnActionModProdAdd(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductController
This allows a part to be selected and added to the bottom table
OnActionModProdcancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductController
This is the cancel button that redirects users back to main screen
OnActionModProdRemove(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductController
This removes a part from the bottom table, a confirmation box will appear to confirm
OnActionModProdSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductController
This allows users to modify input and save it.
OnActionPartSearchButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
This is the search function for the parts table
OnActionProductSearchButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
This is the search function for product
OnActionSelectInHouse(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyPartController
When InHouse is selected, the label will be machine ID
OnActionSelectOutsourced(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyPartController
When Outsourced is selected, the label will change to company name
OnKeyModifyProductSearch(KeyEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductController
This refreshes the table when the search field is cleared
OnKeyPartSearch(KeyEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
This refreshes the table when the search field is cleared
OnKeyProductSearch(KeyEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
